headline: EPAM Systems (EPAM) Announces Rebranding of The Reference as Empathy Lab
summary: EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE:EPAM) is one of the Oversold Growth Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On September 12, EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE:EPAM) announced that The Reference, which is Belgium’s first digital agency, has now been rebranded as Empathy Lab. This merges The Reference with the former Emakina Belgium team to result in Empathy Lab, […]
